member.name: N:Microsoft.SqlServer.MessageBox
member.summary: The exception message box is a programmatic interface that is installed with and used by Microsoft SQL Server 2005 graphical components. The exception message box is a supported interface that you can use in your custom applications to provide significantly more control over the messaging experience than is provided by the class. It also gives your users the options to save error message content for later reference and to get help on messages.

member.summary: Delegate that handles the event that occurs when error information is copied to the Clipboard.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.MessageBox.ExceptionMessageBox
member.summary: Displays a message box that can be customized with text, buttons, and symbols to improve the customer experience with a Microsoft Windows .NET Framework-based application.
